title: Profs
content: Sateesh mudalagi, bm shankar, sindhu pai, indudhar pandurang vali(i think i am cooked with him fs), suma s

comments.body:
Sateesh comes to the class, reads the slides and runs away. Mech is gonna be boring asf so try to atleast act aware(if that makes sense).
Indhudhar is straight up ass, you'll fail if you don't study on your own.

Like are these guys chill? 
I dont have that kinda motivation to rip out 9+ cgpa
all i want is a prof who is not like teacher

As I said, sateesh catches ppl who don't look active. He honestly just does the bare minimum and goes away, doesn't catch ppl for fun. Indu doesn't give 2 fucks although he'll be active during the first 10-15 days. He takes class tests seriously so be prepared.
sindhu is extremely chill , teaches good if u listen to her as well , u can pretty much do whatever u want in her class as she lets u use the laptops..
bms is goated, you dont have to worry about anything at all
BM Shankar the legend, his classes are fun
Suma is chill dude most peaceful teacher I hv seen
